spells.name: Interconnection
spells.short: Reveal Fate's effect on stuff, show sympathetic connections between subjects, show magical oath violations, and show spells with conditional duration.

reaches.effect: Show possession, mind control, and destiny alterations.
Get information on a person's destiny or the parameters of a spell with conditional duration.

spells.name: Oaths Fulfilled
spells.short: Notify mage when specific event mundane event happens to or by a target.

reaches.effect: Get brief vision of the subject when the oath is Fulfilled.
Track (not locate) the subject for the spell's duration.
Event can be something only perceivable in Mage Sight.

spells.name: Quantum Flux
spells.short: Remove action dice penalty of Potency for a number of rounds equal to Potency for the duration; subject can also spend a turn to aim for DP boost (mundane only).

spells.name: Reading the Outmost Eddies
spells.short: Small blessing or curse on the target, like finding some money or stepping in feces.

reaches.effect: The effect occurs within one hour instead of 24.

spells.name: Serendipity
spells.short: Get a clear omen that moves toward the goal.

reaches.effect: When rolling to move toward the goal, substitute any skill of the same type for the one needed.
As before, but substitute any skill.

spells.name: Exceptional Luck
spells.short: Bestow boon or hex.

reaches.effect: Can affect spellcasting rolls.
+1 mana: cast this spell as a reflexive action.

spells.name: Fabricate Fortune
spells.short: Trick conditional duration or conditional trigger spells or create false omens about a subject.

spells.name: Fools Rush In
spells.short: Disallowing preparation for an encounter, spell negates untrained penalties and increases the subject's social impression level by 1.

reaches.effect: Dice bonus of Potency to a number of rolls equal to Potency during the duration choosen before rolling.
As before, but the bonus can affect spellcasting rolls.

spells.name: Lucky Number
spells.short: Guess the correct random number/phrase/code/combination.

spells.name: Shifting the Odds
spells.short: Locate something specific; gain access to social merits equal to Potency. Works quickly if surrounded by similar things as the target.

reaches.effect: Locates the target within 1 hour intead of 24.

spells.name: Warding Gesture
spells.short: Protect against fate or exclude subject from the mage's AoE spells.

reaches.effect: Can selectively exclude the subject from AoE spells and attainments.
Selectively grant protection from supernatural effects that target an area instead of individuals - provokes Clash of Wills.

spells.name: Grave Misfortune
spells.short: The next Potency times the target takes damage, they also take extra Potency damage.

spells.name: Monkey's Paw
spells.short: Enchant an object. Equipment bonus is increased or decreased by Potency, though cannot exceed +/- 5.

reaches.effect: Person touching the object gets either a boon or hex.
+1 mana: bonus/penalty may exceed 5.

spells.name: Shared Fate
spells.short: When one subject suffers damange/tilt/condition, other connected subjects suffer it as well.

reaches.effect: Link only works one way.
Instead of linking the subject to anyone else, the subject instead suffers any damage/tilt/condition they inflict.

spells.name: Superlative Luck
spells.short: Costs 1 mana. Subject gains rote quality on Potency mundane dice rolls. Subject chooses before rolling if they want to use this effect on each roll.

reaches.effect: Subject's player may apply the spell's effect to ritual spellcasting. This doubles the subject's cast time.

spells.name: Sworn Oaths
spells.short: Subject makes a promise and what will happen if they fail to uphold it. While they uphold the promise, they get a boon. Break it, and they suffers the hex they agreed to for the remainder of the Duration. Can be cast on multiple subjects at once to enforce multi-party contracts.

reaches.effect: Mage is aware if the spell is granting a boon or hex.

spells.name: Atonement
spells.short: Dispel an effect if the subject undergoes a journey. It's weird; check the book.

spells.name: Choas Mastery
spells.short: Manipulate probabilities to control the outcome of Potency events. Cannot create supernatural effects. Can control how an accident happens, inflict a condition, reduce a roll to a chance die, protect from circumstances.

spells.name: Divine Intervention
spells.short: Compel the subject to achieve or avoid a task. Subject must be aware of the goal, and it cannot be impossible. Subject has an Aspiration replaced by the goal. Inflicts a hex if the subject goes against the spell.

spells.name: Strings of Fate
spells.short: Patterns Fate to bring about a specific event. If it's simple, it happens as soon as possible. Otherwise, the spell moves toward the goal at least weekly. Goal cannot be impossible.

reaches.effect: Spell instead creates opportunities daily.

spells.name: Sever Oaths
spells.short: Can perform Potency of the following actions: free an entity or soul | change the effect of a boon or hex | modify/negate an oath from a Fate spell | change/dispell conditional trigger | modify the Doom from a Destiny Merit.

reaches.effect: Spell's effects are Lasting.

spells.name: Forge Destiny
spells.short: Apply one of the following effects: grant a supernatural merit that the subject qualifies for, max rating of Potency (Sancity of Merits does not apply) | increase/decrease subject's rating in a supernatural merit by Potency | impose Aspirations/Obsessions of Potency, replacing existing | change the subject's Doom (does not require Destiny Merit)

spells.name: Pariah
spells.short: Turn the world against the subject. Other people are put off by them. Subject takes -Potency to all positive social actions. Any actions at all to help the subject are done so under a hex. Any actions to hinder or hurt the subject are done so with a boon.

reaches.effect: Can adjust the sensitivity of the curse, like by not giving boons to those attempting to kill the subject.

spells.name: Miracle
spells.short: Grants Potency Intercessions, to be spent on the following: increase/decrease successes on a roll by 1 after rolling | cause a reasonably likely event to happen immediately

reaches.effect: +1 intersession, +1 willpower: cause a low-probability event
+1 intercessions, +1 willpower, +1 mana: cause any non-impossible event

spells.name: Swarm of Locusts
spells.short: Inflict a Biblical-level happening on the area, like swarms of animals, total solar eclipses, etc. This occurrance wrecks havoc, immediately causing Breaking Points in Sleepers, and appropriate Environmental Tilts.

spells.name: Divination
spells.short: Ask a yes/no question about the subject's future.

reaches.effect: Ask specific questions and get specific answers.

spells.name: Green Light / Red Light
spells.short: Time speeds up to help or slows down to hinder the subject.

spells.name: Momentary Flux
spells.short: Know if a subject will help or hinder in the near future. Can use on the magic themself to see if their actions will help or hinder.

reaches.effect: Initiative bonus of Potency.

spells.name: Perfect Timing
spells.short: Spending a turn without Defense to plan grants bonus of Potency to next non-extended mundane action.

spells.name: Postcognition
spells.short: See the subject's past.

reaches.effect: Scrub the vision like a video.
Mage does not lose Defense during the viewing.

spells.name: Choose the Thread
spells.short: Subject rolls twice and the mage picks which result they use.

reaches.effect: Can affect spellcasting roles and supernatural powers.

spells.name: Constant Presence
spells.short: Prevent timeline alterations.

spells.name: Hung Spell
spells.short: Delay spells to go off later. Prevents their Duration from decaying. Hanging the spell requires spending 1 mana. Can hold spells up to Potency. When this spell expires, all held spells go off.

spells.name: Shield of Chronos
spells.short: Prevent subject from being viewed by time travelers.

reaches.effect: Can create false events instead of blocking viewing.

spells.name: Tipping the Hourglass
spells.short: Add or subtract Potency from subject's initiative.

spells.name: Veil of Moments
spells.short: Pause time on the subject - they won't bleed out or die from poison; conditions and tilts cannot be applied on the subject for the duration.

reaches.effect: Ignore Persistent conditions for the duration (does not satisfy time requirements for condition to lapse).
Subject can heal naturally.
Subject can regain willpower.
Subject can regain mana.

spells.name: Acceleration
spells.short: Costs 1 mana. Multiply subject's Speed by Potency. Subject always goes first in a turn. Add Potency to Defense before calculating Dodge. Can use Defense against firearms.

reaches.effect: Divide the time per roll of mundane extended actions by Potency.
+1 mana: dodge actions have the rote quality.

spells.name: Chronos' Curse
spells.short: Costs 1 mana. Divide the subject's Speed by Potency, rounding down. Subject goes last in a turn. Subject's Defense is reduced by Potency.

reaches.effect: +1 mana: subject loses Defense against attacks.
Multiply the time per roll of mundane extended actions by Potency.

spells.name: Shifting Sands
spells.short: Travel back in time by Potency in turns. The mage retains injuries and conditions gained in the undone turns, and spent Mana and Willpower are not returned. Other spells cast on the subject in the revised time are canceled. When this spell ends, the changes are Lasting.

reaches.effect: Travel back a full scene instead (can apply this reach multiple times).

spells.name: Temporal Summoning
spells.short: Reverse time on a subject for the duration. Can restore things to what the used to be, including far in the past with Temporal Sympathy. Cannot bring the dead back to life.

spells.name: Weight of Years
spells.short: Advance time on the subject, inflicting Potency in bashing damage. Also works on structures. Might not work on immportal creatures.

reaches.effect: Reduce subject's Athletics rating by Potency.

spells.name: Present as Past
spells.short: Costs 1 mana. In combat, the subject can require all affected subjects to declare their actions before taking them. The subject can act at any point in the Initiative order. This supersedes all other Initiative modifying effects except Time spells which are a Clash of Wills. In Social Combat, mage adds Potency Doors to themself or subtracts Potency Doors from their opponent.

spells.name: Prophecy
spells.short: Like Divination, but works for hypothetical situations and what might happen. Ask Potency questions.

reaches.effect: In Social Combat, reduce the subject's Doors by Potency.

spells.name: Rend Lifespan
spells.short: Inflict Potency lethal damage by aging different parts of the subject's body. Ageless entities are immune.

reaches.effect: +1 mana: inflicts aggravated damage.

spells.name: Rewrite history
spells.short: Alter the subject's past, changing events and outcomes in their life to change their current self. Temporal Sympathy applies. Cannot create an impossible timeline. After spell expiration, the subject reverts to their true history, but they will remember their false history like a dream. Does not affect supernatural creatures.

reaches.effect: Reassign Potency Skill or Merit dots; cannot exceed maximums.
Reassign Potency Attribute dots; cannot exceed chargen minimums; cannot exceed maximums.
Affect supernatural creatures. Cannot remove their supernatural advantages, but can make entities that were transformed experience life as if that event hadn't occurred.

spells.name: Temporal Stutter
spells.short: Push the subject forward in time after the Duration. Preserves location and momentum unless the caster also has Space 2 and uses a Sympathic Range Attainment.

spells.name: Blink of an Eye
spells.short: Next extended action becomes an instant action by combining Potency rolls into a single turn. Does not affect ritual casting.

reaches.effect: +1 mana: increase Gnosis by Potency for ritual casting time.

spells.name: Corridors of Time
spells.short: Send a subject back into their own past. They exist there for the Duration of the spell or until they meet the present. Changes are Lasting. Temporal Sympathy applies. Can add Space 2 and the Sympathetic Range Attainment to choose where in space the subject is located when sent back. Cannot send a subject back before they were born.

spells.name: Temporal Pocket
spells.short: Freeze time for Duration. Time applies as normal to the subject. Attempting to physically change the world ends the spell, but succeeds.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.short: Requires including all Arcana involved in the target spell with at least 1 dot. Supresses the spell. Add Fate 1 to supress it for a number of selected subjects.

reaches.effect: +1 mana: effect is lasting. If the spell's caster has not relinquished the spell, they are made aware.

spells.name: Pierce Deception
spells.short: See through illusions, phantasms, and lies. May cause a Clash of Wills to see through magical falsehoods. Only reveals active falsehoods.

reaches.effect: Get an idea what the truth is.

spells.name: Supernal Vision
spells.short: Study a subject for one turn, then know the connection to the Supernal (Sleeper/Sleepwalker/Mage/Proximus, or Demesne/Verge, or Imbued/Enhanced/Artifact). Also ask Potency from the following: mana count | supernal world alignment | highest-rated arcanum | level of an arcanum | how many arcana | level of nimbus | level of gnosis.

reaches.effect: Shows nature of supernatural beings/effects, but the Mage might understand it.

spells.name: Sacred Geometry
spells.short: See ley lines and nodes. If none are visible from the caster's position, they get the direction of the nearest. Add Death 1 or Spirit 1: show Avernian Gates or Loci, respectively.

reaches.effect: Know if the node is on a Hallow.

spells.name: Scribe Grimoire
spells.withstand: Total Arcanum dots of all Arcana uesd in the scribed spell.
spells.short: Costs 1 mana. Create a Grimoire of a known Rote, or copy a Rote from another Grimoire. Only 1 Rote per cast. Grimoires can hold multiple Rotes, depending on physical size. Lasts for Duration.

reaches.effect: +1 mana: lasting.

spells.name: Word of Command
spells.short: Bypass magical triggers/conditions. Effect immediately triggers. If the effect requires mana to activate, the caster must supply it. Adding other relevant Arcanum can enable triggering effects tied to that Arcanum.
